attributes.action: The jurisdiction of the Common Fisheries Policy must end after March 29 2019
attributes.additional_details: We can only achieve that by leaving the CFP.
attributes.background:
The Common Fisheries Policy has decimated our fishing industry. 
We believe that the jurisdiction of the CFP must end after March 29 2019
Our fishing industry and coastal towns must not be decimated by keeping it. 
We should have full control of our fishing grounds.
